
```{r ss-x}
sum_sq <- function(df, measure) {
  df %>% summarise(ss = sum(({{measure}} - mean({{measure}}))^2))
}

sum_sq(chaff3, mass)
```
``` {r summ}
chaff3_summary <- chaff3 %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  summarise(mean_mass = mean(mass))
```
